step_data.thought: I'm now on the Email Templates page in the Magento Admin Panel. My goal is to create a new email template for customer communications. Looking at the page, I can see a list of existing email templates and an 'Add New Template' button at the top of the page. This is exactly what I need to click to create a new email template.
